title: Time With Norma Jeane
description: A troubled young woman time slips to 1954 and is picked up on the side of a road by her idol, Marilyn Monroe.Together, they embark on their own personal journeys—one a coming-of-age—the other, Marilyn’s journey, a struggle to reconcile with her past and perhaps change the future. Along the way, they grow close, meet unexpected historical characters, and discover the true meaning of friendship and love.But what awaits them in the future?"Elyse Douglas captured magic and put it on the page."—Ambling Bookworm Reviews
author: Elyse Douglas
